content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CONTENTS:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I.\\tGENERAL PART\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"II.\\tOCCUPATIONAL RISK FACTORS AND SAFETY MEASURES\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"III.\\tPREPARATION FOR SAFE WORKING\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IV.\\tSAFE PERFORMANCE OF WORK\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"V.\\tACTIONS IN CASES OF EMERGENCY\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VI.\\tACTIONS AFTER WORK\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I. GENERAL PART\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.\\tThis Guide sets out the main health and safety and occupational hygiene requirements for employees to prevent the spread of COVID-19 disease (coronavirus infection) in the working environment.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.\\tThe new coronavirus (2019-nCoV or SARS-CoV-2) (hereinafter – the coronavirus) is a virus with a novel structure that has never caused infections in humans before. The disease caused by the coronavirus infection is called COVID-19.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"II. OCCUPATIONAL RISK FACTORS AND SAFETY MEASURES \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dangerous occupational risk factors and safety measures:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.1. Risk factor\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":14723,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a0f9da82-95be-4da8-9974-dd415619371f/1.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a0f9da82-95be-4da8-9974-dd415619371f/1.jpg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"1.jpg\",\"name\":\"1.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a0f9da82-95be-4da8-9974-dd415619371f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":111,\"height\":118},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The coronavirus \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SARS-CoV-2 causes a coronavirus infectious disease (COVID-19).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The coronavirus has flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, shortness of breath and other respiratory problems. In more severe cases, the virus causes pneumonia, severe acute respiratory syndrome, kidney failure or death. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Coronavirus is transmitted from person to person, usually through close contact with a person with a viral infection. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The main modes of transmission of coronavirus infection are as follows (see figure below):\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The main mode of transmission is through airborne respiratory secretions (airborne droplets), which people release into the environment by sneezing, coughing or exhaling. In this case, relatively close contact between people is necessary (thought to be no more than 2 metres).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is possible to get infected by touching various objects in the environment, often touching surfaces that are contaminated with the virus (e.g., a sick person sneezes without covering their mouth and nose and spreads droplets that settle on a table or other surfaces. A healthy person who touches such a surface and then wipes his eyes with dirty hands or scratches his nose may become infected and fall ill.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":156588,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/013964b4-a3b0-4c86-8dde-66ffd93baaf2/2.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/013964b4-a3b0-4c86-8dde-66ffd93baaf2/2.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"2.jpg\",\"name\":\"2.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"013964b4-a3b0-4c86-8dde-66ffd93baaf2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":579.0728744939271},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Koronavirusu apsikrėtęs asmuo – Person infected with coronavirus\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Artimas kontaktas – Close contact\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Virusas ore - Virus in the air\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sveikas asmuo – Healthy person\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Iškvėpimas - Exhale\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Plitimas oro lašeliniu būdu - Airborne transmission\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Įkvėpimas - Inhale\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Nudėdimas - Settling \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Paviršiaus lietimas – Touching surfaces\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Veido (nosies arba burnos) lietimas – Touching the face (nose or mouth)\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Nusėdimas ant paviršių - Settling on surfaces\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Virusas nusėdęs ant paviršiaus - Virus settling on a surface\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Užkrestų paviršių ir veido lietimas - Touching contaminated surfaces and face\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The incubation period of the coronavirus (i.e. the period between infection and the onset of symptoms) ranges from 2 to 14 days, with an average of 7 days. Although people are usually infected at the onset of symptoms, it is suspected that some people may transmit the virus before symptoms appear.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.2. Safety measures (collective and organisational)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table\",\"data\":{\"cellSizes\":[254,723]},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":16482,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ec2533f1-5e76-4555-a4f3-3b32fcd1eb5f/3.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ec2533f1-5e76-4555-a4f3-3b32fcd1eb5f/3.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"3.png\",\"name\":\"3.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ec2533f1-5e76-4555-a4f3-3b32fcd1eb5f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":99,\"height\":99},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Coming to work and working only in the absence of signs of communicable diseases (e.g. fever, runny nose, cough, shortness of breath, vomiting, diarrhoea, etc.), acute upper respiratory tract infections or acute intestinal infections, and without fever (body temperature must not be higher than 36.9 °C).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If fever is suspected, the body temperature should be checked at home before going to work.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is forbidden to come to work if the employee is under self-isolation.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":42228,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2824aba1-c9df-40fd-bd26-2eef2006a1a9/4.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2824aba1-c9df-40fd-bd26-2eef2006a1a9/4.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"4.png\",\"name\":\"4.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"2824aba1-c9df-40fd-bd26-2eef2006a1a9\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":101,\"height\":101},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is necessary to wash hands thoroughly on arrival at work and thereafter during regular breaks (as often as possible, but at least every 1-2 hours), either with warm running water and liquid soap or by disinfecting with a special hand sanitizer.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hands should also be washed whenever they are dirty, after WC, after coughing, sneezing, coming from the outside, before eating, etc. When washing hands, refer to the leaflets posted in the premises.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":15552,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ecc33274-340b-4185-acde-99e561fb8633/5.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ecc33274-340b-4185-acde-99e561fb8633/5.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"5.png\",\"name\":\"5.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ecc33274-340b-4185-acde-99e561fb8633\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":102,\"height\":102},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Maintain a distance of at least 1 m between workstations (>2 m is recommended) and avoid physical contact between employees. The distance between workstations may be less than 1 m if there are partitions between workstations.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Given that COVID-19 is mainly spread by airborne droplets, the greatest risk is during one-to-one conversations, therefore, a distance of >2 m should be maintained when communicating.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":44336,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e68c6b2e-edb9-4925-820d-9db91f949121/6.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e68c6b2e-edb9-4925-820d-9db91f949121/6.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"6.png\",\"name\":\"6.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e68c6b2e-edb9-4925-820d-9db91f949121\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":110,\"height\":110},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Observe coughing and sneezing etiquette (coughing or sneezing while covered with a disposable tissue or on the inside of a bent elbow). Dispose of the used disposable wipe in the rubbish bin.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":18311,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/05f4e6ea-5c19-454e-885f-c4c9c4e1b161/7.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/05f4e6ea-5c19-454e-885f-c4c9c4e1b161/7.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"7.png\",\"name\":\"7.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"05f4e6ea-5c19-454e-885f-c4c9c4e1b161\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":113,\"height\":113},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Clean frequently touched surfaces (cabinet door handles, electrical switches, chair arms, computer keyboard, mouse, telephone (fixed and mobile), etc.) with a surface disinfectant cleaner at least 2 times a day. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Clean frequently touched surfaces of the car with a surface disinfectant cleaner or wet wipes at least once a day.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For disinfection, use products containing > 60 % ethanol.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":17188,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ee9829bd-e415-40c4-a412-b234bb61a82b/8.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ee9829bd-e415-40c4-a412-b234bb61a82b/8.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"8.png\",\"name\":\"8.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ee9829bd-e415-40c4-a412-b234bb61a82b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":114,\"height\":114},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Avoid the handshake greeting: greet verbally, nod the head.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":17246,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ca4e9708-261c-4138-a572-432cb87f01d2/9.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ca4e9708-261c-4138-a572-432cb87f01d2/9.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"9.png\",\"name\":\"9.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ca4e9708-261c-4138-a572-432cb87f01d2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":114,\"height\":114},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not touch the face, eyes, nose, mouth, etc., with hands (especially with unwashed or non-sanitised hands).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":19494,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0a8dfffd-db0a-42a9-953b-ea61105f322b/10.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0a8dfffd-db0a-42a9-953b-ea61105f322b/10.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"10.png\",\"name\":\"10.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0a8dfffd-db0a-42a9-953b-ea61105f322b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":110,\"height\":110},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Organise meetings and briefings remotely where possible. If meetings are held in a single office space, all employees must wear nose and mouth protection, try to maintain safe distances, and limit contact time (no more than 15 minutes). In rest and eating areas, as few employees as possible (as many as can be accommodated within a 1 m distance) should be present at the same time (resting, preparing food or eating).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":80554,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/66899af5-99fc-4aa9-a749-3bad3b444e87/11.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/66899af5-99fc-4aa9-a749-3bad3b444e87/11.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"11.png\",\"name\":\"11.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"66899af5-99fc-4aa9-a749-3bad3b444e87\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":132,\"height\":69},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Where forced mechanical ventilation system is available in the premises it should be kept running at high capacity. If there is no ventilation system, ventilate the work area naturally (avoid drafts!).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":14094,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c4ec1062-9380-494a-980b-e27804c38ba1/12.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c4ec1062-9380-494a-980b-e27804c38ba1/12.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"12.png\",\"name\":\"12.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c4ec1062-9380-494a-980b-e27804c38ba1\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":101,\"height\":101},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Avoid travelling to/from work by public transport as much as possible (especially during a declared epidemic/quarantine period), when using public transport wear nose and mouth protection and adhere to all the personal hygiene requirements described above.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal protective equipment (PPE)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table\",\"data\":{\"cellSizes\":[257,715]},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":54696,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ef480e31-83ad-45f3-aca8-f82bc5005845/13.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ef480e31-83ad-45f3-aca8-f82bc5005845/13.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"13.png\",\"name\":\"13.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ef480e31-83ad-45f3-aca8-f82bc5005845\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":157,\"height\":140},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Wearing of respiratory protective equipment (as required, depending on the risk and working environment):\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Medical mask \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Respirator\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_row\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":9265,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4a03800e-0a5c-48ac-8cc9-68a6b6756335/3.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4a03800e-0a5c-48ac-8cc9-68a6b6756335/3.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"3.jpg\",\"name\":\"3.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4a03800e-0a5c-48ac-8cc9-68a6b6756335\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":192,\"height\":144},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"table_cell\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Wearing of hand protection (as required, depending on risk and working environment conditions):\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Disposable gloves\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"III. PREPARATION FOR SAFE WORKING\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.\\tThe main requirements to be observed before starting the work are described in Chapter II. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IV. SAFE PERFORMANCE OF WORK\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.\\tBe guided by the additional visual information provided in thematic posters or leaflets displayed at entrances to the premises and in various areas of the company. Wear the specified personal protective equipment before entering the premises and follow other instructions for preventing the spread of COVID-19.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.\\tAs few employees as possible (only the number of persons who can be accommodated within a 2 m clearance) should be present at any one time (resting, cooking or eating) in the rest and dining areas. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6.\\tFor interactions during breaks or rest and meal periods, maintain a distance of >2 m, choose more spacious rooms, and when possible and weather conditions are favourable, interact outdoors.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7.\\tAvoid meeting with customers in the office, and when receiving them maintain a distance of at least 2 metres, shorten the contact time (no more than 15 minutes) and wear nose and mouth protection. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"8.\\tKeep personal work clothes and personal protective equipment (PPE) separately from everyday clothing.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9.\\tWear the provided PPE in accordance with the manufacturers’ instructions and in accordance with instructions given during briefing or training.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Medical mask:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.1. is designed to mechanically trap droplets of respiratory secretions; when coughing or sneezing, it forms a physical barrier and prevents the spread of droplets that may contain a virus into the ambient air, and can therefore help to protect against the spread of the virus when people are not yet aware whether they are infected;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.2. is for personal use only - it should not be shared with others and is disposable - it must be replaced if gets wet (but not worn for more than 4 hours).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10.3. medical masks are only effective when used correctly (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Fig.1\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"):\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":301886,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0eea88cc-8dfa-4769-953a-1af6cb067c2f/new1.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0eea88cc-8dfa-4769-953a-1af6cb067c2f/new1.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"new1.PNG\",\"name\":\"new1.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0eea88cc-8dfa-4769-953a-1af6cb067c2f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":582.4378378378378},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Take off the mask correctly (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Fig. 2\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"):\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":153592,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ebf0655d-1387-439c-a50d-913d52d49400/new 2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ebf0655d-1387-439c-a50d-913d52d49400/new 2.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"new 2.PNG\",\"name\":\"new 2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ebf0655d-1387-439c-a50d-913d52d49400\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":340.0999231360492},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Respirators:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11.1. are designed to protect against aerosols and fine particles of various harmful substances in ambient air. They filter ambient air during inhalation and trap fine particles present in ambient air;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11.2. respirators of FFP3 or at least FFP2 class are suitable for protection against COVID-19 virus; the respirator’s protection class is indicated on each respirator;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11.3. for effectiveness, a good fit to the face is essential, so it is important to assess whether a particular model is suitable for a particular person when choosing a respirator;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11.4. wearing a respirator on the beard does not ensure maximum fit to the face and therefore reduces the effectiveness of the respirator;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11.5. a respirator is a personal protective equipment intended for personal use only and must not be shared with others;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11.6. only the correct fitting of the respirator provides adequate protection. The putting on may vary slightly from model to model, so the manufacturer’s instructions must be followed; the general principles for putting on and taking off a respirator are specified below (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Fig. 3\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"):\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":190423,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3fe701f0-e1a5-4082-859b-46acdc030223/new3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3fe701f0-e1a5-4082-859b-46acdc030223/new3.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"new3.PNG\",\"name\":\"new3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3fe701f0-e1a5-4082-859b-46acdc030223\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":496.3411764705882},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":60849,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6c805dfc-cbef-4063-be74-38abb29afe41/new4.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6c805dfc-cbef-4063-be74-38abb29afe41/new4.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"new4.PNG\",\"name\":\"new4.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6c805dfc-cbef-4063-be74-38abb29afe41\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":315.88641596316194},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"12.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Disposable gloves:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"12.1. when wearing disposable gloves, do not touch the face with them;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"12.2. replace disposable gloves if they are punctured or otherwise damaged, as well as considering frequent contact with potentially contaminated surfaces;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"12.3. after taking off disposable gloves, discard them and do not reuse them;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"12.4. put on/ take off disposable gloves correctly (Fig. 4):\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":268411,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b2587b93-6532-4295-ac81-bca3085ae8f0/new 5.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b2587b93-6532-4295-ac81-bca3085ae8f0/new 5.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"new 5.PNG\",\"name\":\"new 5.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b2587b93-6532-4295-ac81-bca3085ae8f0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":585.572072072072},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"13.\\tUse the means and methods for disinfecting frequently touched surfaces and PPE provided by the responsible persons of the company. Do not handle disinfectants without consulting the Safety Data Sheets (SDS) for chemicals used and without wearing the PPE specified in the SDS. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"14.\\tWhen visiting customers and carrying out work functions on their premises (working off-site), the requirements not less stringent than those established in this Guide must be observed. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"15.\\tBefore visiting customers, first find out the additional conditions applicable to visitors and contractors regarding the prevention of COVID-19. Read the information publicly available in the customer premises.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"16.\\tAgree the purpose and duration of the visit with the customer in advance in order to minimise social contacts and their duration. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"17.\\tIf proper and safe working conditions are not provided on the company or customer premises, the employee may refuse to work under unsafe conditions and inform the line manager about the reasons for the refusal.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"V. ACTIONS IN CASES OF EMERGENCY\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"18.\\tEvery employee of the company must immediately inform the line manager in case of feeling or suspecting symptoms of COVID-19 (flu-like symptoms of the coronavirus, such as temperature rise (37.3°C or more), sore throat, fever, sneezing or coughing, diarrhoea or vomiting), or if they are diagnosed with COVID-19 disease.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"19.\\tThe employees who have been in contact with a confirmed or suspected case should inform the person in charge and discuss the possibility of working remotely for 14 days (even in the absence of any symptoms) and self-isolation measures.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VI. ACTIONS AFTER WORK\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"20.\\tWash hands thoroughly with warm running water and liquid soap or disinfect them with special hand sanitizers.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"21.\\tDisinfect reusable PPE (goggles, face shields, etc.) and place it in a designated storage area. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
